mapper.update: update IPO_PUBPAYMENT_TRACK set COMMODITYID = #{commodityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYABLES = #{payables,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATEPERSON = #{createperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATEDATE = #{createdate,jdbcType=DATE}, UPDATEPERSON = #{updateperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATEDATE = #{updatedate,jdbcType=DATE}, DELETEFLAG = #{deleteflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where TRACKID = #{trackid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select TRACKID, COMMODITYID, PAYABLES, STATUS, CREATEPERSON, CREATEDATE, UPDATEPERSON, UPDATEDATE, DELETEFLAG from IPO_PUBPAYMENT_TRACK where TRACKID = #{trackid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select TRACKID, COMMODITYID, PAYABLES, STATUS, CREATEPERSON, CREATEDATE, UPDATEPERSON, UPDATEDATE, DELETEFLAG from IPO_PUBPAYMENT_TRACK
